Lithuanian Grammar

28 Lithuanian lessons

made by Pigmalijonas

Written in:  
About:  
20
1

This lesson list is an overview of Lithuanian grammar for intermediate and advanced learners.

Nouns - Learn everything about nouns, their cases and declensions.
Adjectives - Learn all about adjectives, their declensions, comparison, the pronominal adjectives and the neuter gender.
Adverbs - Learn the bases of adverbs and their comparison.
Numbers - Learn about Lithuanian numbers. (Declining 2-3, 4-9, 11-19.)
Pronouns - Learn about pronouns: personal, impersonal and possesive.
Verbs - Learn the bases of verbs and their conjugations, tenses and moods. (Reflexive forms.)
Conjunctions - Learn the bases of Lithuanian conjunctions.
Prepositions - Learn about Lithuanian prepositions.
Interjections - Learn about Lithuanian interjections. As if there was much to learn.
Participles - Learn about Lithuanian participles.
